00015 void Attribute::AddTagDescriptionToStr(SimpleString& str)
00016 {
00017   if(description !=  "")
00018     {
00019       str = str
00020     + "<description>"
00021     + description
00022     + "</description>";
00023     }
00024
00025   if(formatDescription != "")
00026     {
00027       str += "<formatDescription>";
00028       PutAValueInCData(formatDescription, str);
00029       str += "</formatDescription>";
00030     }
00031 }

00033 void Attribute::PutAValueInCData(const SimpleString val, SimpleString& str){
00034   str += "<![CDATA[";
00035   str += val;
00036   str += "]]>";
00037 }

00060                         const SimpleString& name,
00061                         SimpleString& str,
00062                         bool end)
00063 {
00064   str = str + "<"+ type + " name=\"" + name;
